'''Radiant Spincrystal 87''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Emerald in the Desert]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located at [[Sobek Oasis]].
